availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William F. Chandler (Taylor County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of B. Chandler and Mary H. Chandler. Married to Anna Herd Chandler in Taylor County on March 31, 1863. Merchant in Taylor County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, Campbellsville, p. 41.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Roll #000983728, Taylor County Marriages, p. 282-83.
Find A Grave, "W. F. Chandler (January 23, 1823-February 12, 1875)," Memorial #70772930, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/70772930 (accessed April 23, 2018).
